banner.description: I’m a Front End Web Developer.
about.title: About Me
about.content.title: I’m a Front End Web Developer.
about.content.first: Hello! I am a trainee web developer with a strong background in HTML, CSS and JS. Beyond having formal studies, both at the high-school and college levels, related to computing; I like to train myself all the time, taking courses on online platforms such as Platzi or EDteam.
about.content.second: Although I currently have a very frontend-oriented profile. My wish is, when I consider myself sufficiently trained in handling React, to start educating myself in technologies belonging to the back; such as Python or NodeJS.
about.content.third: In addition to the knowledge of technologies related to web development, I have notions of C#, SQL and the `.NET` environment.
skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Knowledge of languages, frameworks and work tools.
education.title: Education
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you want to contact me, you can access the following information:
message.placeholder.name: Full Name

message-form.content.first-success: ¡Thank you very much for your interest!
message-form.content.second-success: I will answer as fast as I can.
message-form.content.first-error: The message could not be sent.
